synopsis.text: Shinobu Suzuki, Hikaru Suzuki, Sayaka Hoshino, and Chihiro Itou are four students who begin their journey at the same junior high school. On the first day, Hikaru is captivated by Sayaka's captivating performance of a drama on the school's rooftop. As Hikaru develops feelings for Sayaka, his childhood friend Chihiro secretly harbors affection for him. Meanwhile, another Suzuki, Shinobu, finds himself falling for Chihiro, despite sharing no relation to Hikaru. As they navigate their teenage years, these four friends experience love, longing, and the complexities of adolescence. When Hikaru and Sayaka reunite at age 17, their story takes a new turn, revealing the intricate web of emotions and relationships that have developed between them.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
